title: Şule Gürbüz's Mime Workshop (4-week Series)
description:
🌟 The 4-week series starting May 23 will not meet June 13 🌟

🌟 Embark on a Journey of Expression and Creativity with Şule Gürbüz's Mime Workshop! 🌟

🎭 Join us at Bridgerat Studios in Portland for an unforgettable 4-week exploration into the enchanting world of mime. Led by the renowned mime artist and educator, Şule Gürbüz, this immersive course promises to ignite your imagination, hone your skills, and unleash your inner performer.

👏 What People are Saying: 🌟 "Şule, the clown, is an incredible performer with exceptional artistic abilities. Her dedication to her craft and rapport with the audience is truly remarkable, and her extensive experience makes her an outstanding teacher." - Mariano Jaja, former clown at Cirque du Soleil 🌟 "Şule's teaching style is one of true constructive support – you will receive warm instruction and feedback all along the way from an expert who will ensure you both learn the material and walk out with a smile." - John Carter, Songwriter / Singer / Playwright / Poet

🎭 About the Instructor: Introducing Şule Gürbüz, a remarkable mime artist with an illustrious career spanning several decades. With training under the esteemed mime instructor, Taner Barlas, Şule's passion for the art form blossomed, leading her to become one of the pioneering members of Turkey’s first-ever mime theatre group.

From captivating audiences with mesmerizing performances to spreading joy as a Clown Doctor in hospitals, Şule has dedicated her life to the transformative power of mime and non-verbal communication. Now, she's thrilled to share her wealth of knowledge and experiences with you in this exclusive workshop.

🔗 Connect with Şule: For updates and behind-the-scenes moments, follow Şule on Instagram: @shoelacestheclown.

You can also find more about her performances and bookings on GigSalad

title: Şule Gürbüz's Mime Workshop (1 Class Drop-in)
description:

title: Cold-Process Soap Making
description:
In this 3-hour workshop we will make our own soap using the cold-process method. We will combine a blend of natural oils and lye to make our own soap base from scratch and liven it up with an assortment essential oils and colorants.

Participants will learn:
  • how to work with lye safely
  • the basics of soap-making chemistry
  • the know-how to continue experimenting on their own

Everyone will leave with about 1 pound of their very own amazing soap.

All materials are included in the cost of the workshop.
